data.name: MainWindowHelper1
data.value: This is the main window, it is used to show an overview of the application, the results and is used to start the simulation

data.name: MainWindowHelper2
data.value: Their are 6 different section in this window:

data.name: MainWindowHelper3
data.value: - Force: It's used to modifiy the force or open the force editor.

data.name: MainWindowHelper4
data.value: - Piece: It's used to show all created pieces and open the piece editor

data.name: MainWindowHelper5
data.value: - Layer: it's used to show all created layers and open the layer editor.

data.name: MainWindowHelper6
data.value: - Material: it's used to show all created pieces and open the piece editor.

data.name: MainWindowHelper7
data.value: - Result: The graph shows the the results of the simulation.

data.name: MainWindowHelper8
data.value: - Start: The button is used to start the simulation, one piece must be selected in the piece section

data.name: MainWindowHelper9
data.value: Here you can see a video with a demo.
